Headline: #72 North Temporary Westbound Reroute near North Avenue/Laramie
ShortDescription: Westbound #72 North buses are rerouted via North Avenue, Cicero, Division, Central and North Avenue, due to fire department activity near North Avenue/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Cicero, Division, Central, then resume normal route on North Avenue, due to fire department activity near North Avenue/Laramie.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #20 Madison Reroute near Madison/Hamlin
ShortDescription: Westbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted near Madison/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Hamlin, Washington, Pulaski, Madison, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Madison/Hamlin.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
